customCommands.name: test
customCommands.prompt:
{{{ input }}}

Write a comprehensive set of unit tests for the selected code. It should setup, run, and teardown tests, and cover both happy paths and edge cases.

customCommands.name: refactor
customCommands.prompt:
{{{ input }}}

Refactor this code to be more modular, efficient, and readable. Use modern best practices.

customCommands.name: explain
customCommands.prompt:
{{{ input }}}

Explain how this code works in detail.

customCommands.name: doc
customCommands.prompt:
{{{ input }}}

Write JSDoc/TSDoc documentation for this code.

slashCommands.name: comment
slashCommands.description: Write comments for the selected code

slashCommands.name: share
slashCommands.description: Export the current chat session to markdown
